not.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM product_package ppkg LEFT JOIN product_price pp ON ppkg.product_price_id=pp.id WHERE ppkg.product_price_id IS NOT NULL AND pp.id IS NULL;

changeSet.sql: UPDATE product_package pkg SET pkg.product_price_id = NULL WHERE pkg.id IN (SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ppkg.id FROM product_package ppkg LEFT JOIN product_price pp ON ppkg.product_price_id=pp.id WHERE ppkg.product_price_id IS NOT NULL AND pp.id IS NULL ) as ppkg_ids);
